channel.title: Help with fr33sc4p3 development
channel.description:
ok i need to know how to do a few things: first off i need to know how to make myself an admin second i need to know how to make it not lag last how do i make npcs say if i am on or not
-dont spam

i don’t care for lescape but he is right…the code goes something like

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 1658) { // NPCS NAME - NPCS PURPOSE EX. ROBE STORE if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT HE IS GOING TO SAY"; } }
but first you have to have the npc in all of the other files

item.title: Help with fr33sc4p3 development
item.dc:creator: @mr_pwnage_1 mr pwnage 1
item.description:
@mr_pwnage_1 wrote:

on fr33sc4p3 pkz, if i am correct, there is already an old man out front of the dummys saying if thug life is online or not. if there is, all you need to do is go to client.java, and search for thug life, and replace his name with yours, but make sure you do it with both online and offline (means you have to change two of um)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with fr33sc4p3 development
item.dc:creator: @Cyclops72 Cyclops72
item.description:
@Cyclops72 wrote:

Q: Making your self Admin
A: Go in your characters folder and search for your name and click on your note pad and then press ctrl+f and search “Player rights” and then it’ll say 0, change it to 3 and you’ll be the owner and 1 is a silver mod and 2 is a gold mod

Q: How to make it non-laggy
A: Most of it depends on how good your computer is.

Last question I can’t answer idk

Read full topic
